page.content:
Summary: Key Points and Next Steps

This session introduced a variety of resources to assist practitioners in embedding workforce preparation activities into curriculum and instruction, including:

  • Employability Skills Framework;
  • Transitions Integration Framework (TIF);
  • Guide to ELA Classroom Activities that Promote Life Skills, College, and Career Readiness;
  • North Carolina Network for Excellence in Teaching (NC-NET) Employability Skills Resource Toolkit; and
  • Three digital literacy resources:
  • LINCS Digital Literacy web page
  • Tech Tips for Teachers blog
  • Teaching Excellence in Adult Literacy (TEAL) Center

The second course in this two-part series on workforce preparation activities, Workforce Preparation in the Classroom, will guide participants further in the process of developing strategies for integrating the activities into their instruction.
